description: This header file defines the interface for an event producer system using multicast UDP sockets to broadcast JSON-encoded events. It includes function declarations for initializing, broadcasting, and shutting down an event producer, along with licensing information and comments explaining usage and design considerations.

methods.name: initEventProducer
methods.description: Initializes the event producer system with a specific service ID, returning a handle for subsequent event broadcasts.

methods.name: broadcastEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts an event encapsulated in a JSON object using the specified event producer handle.

methods.name: shutdownEventProducer
methods.description: Closes sockets and cleans up resources associated with the event producer.
